resources.string:
2 eggs
60g sugar
50g flour
60g butter
90g dark chocolate 75%
cocoa powder and ice-cream to serve

1. grind the sugar to a powder.

2. melt butter and chocolate either by using a water bath or the microwave.

3. mix eggs and sugar powder in another dish. Mix with flour.

4. add the melted butter and chocolate to the mixture. blend all ingredients until they are smooth.

5. divide the mixture between the forms. cook the dessert in the oven at 175°C for 6–7 minutes.
cooked fondant should be crusted and inside should remain liquid. you can use cocoa powder to decorate the dessert. hot fondant goes great with ice cream. bon appetit!
